sentence.Network_en: One of the distinct individuals forming a colonial animal such as a bryozoan or hydrozoan.

means.word_mean: 1. sessile aquatic animal forming mosslike colonies of small polyps each having a curved or circular ridge bearing tentacles; attach to stones or seaweed and reproduce by budding
